sentences.en: Amethyst holds the vibration of Structure in the first 10 notes of the Language of Light.
sentences.cn: 紫水晶掌握光之语首10个音调中结构的振动.

sentences.en: Amethyst was believed by the Greeks to protect a person from drunkenness.
sentences.cn: 希腊人认为紫水晶可以防止人喝醉。

sentences.en: And the third row a ligure, an agate, and an amethyst.
sentences.cn: 出28:19第三行是紫玛瑙 、 白玛瑙 、 紫晶.

sentences.en: Bullion - Gold and Silver, Ores Tantalo, Gold, Amethyst, Crystal BullionSilver.
sentences.cn: 采购产品金块 - 黄金和银, 矿石, 黄金, 紫水晶, 水晶.

sentences.en: Depending on the collections we use rose quartz, tiger eye, rock crystal, amethyst or jade.
sentences.cn: 依照不同的系列,我们使用了玫瑰石英 、 虎眼石、天然水晶 、 紫水晶以及玉石.

sentences.en: His eyes deepened into amethyst, and across them came a mist of tears.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛里的血丝甚至变成了紫色, 而且眼中也泪水涟涟.

sentences.en: I want an amethyst ring, but I do not know what my ring size is.
sentences.cn: 我要一只紫水晶戒指, 但是我不知道我的戒指尺码.

sentences.en: Most of it is a variety of amethyst: that heat turned brown.
sentences.cn: 大多数石英是一种 紫水晶,高温使其变为棕色.

sentences.en: Natural quartz crystal from DONGHAI, JIANG SU mostly include amethyst , smoky quartz and yellow quartz.
sentences.cn: 东海天然有色水晶主要有紫晶 、 烟晶、黄水晶.

sentences.en: On display are earrings, necklaces and bracelets made from jade, amber and amethyst.
sentences.cn: 展出的有用玉石 、 琥珀和紫水晶做的耳环 、 项链和手镯.

sentences.en: Product Info : Quartz, Tiger Eye , Quartz Aventurine, Amethyst , Quartz Smoky, Agate.
sentences.cn: 材质: 白晶,茶晶, 粉晶, 玛瑙, 东陵玉, 虎眼石,紫晶.

sentences.en: Research results on growth of amethyst crystal by hydrothermal method are presented.
sentences.cn: 报道了水热法人工紫色水晶生长研究的结果.

sentences.en: The Genevieve key ring sparkles with Amethyst , Fuchsia , Jet , Violet, clear crystals, and red enamel.
sentences.cn: 红色搪瓷上的装饰配搭紫色, 紫红色,黑色, 紫罗兰色和透明的水晶.

sentences.en: The necklace consisted of amethysts set in gold.
sentences.cn: 这条项链是金镶紫水晶的。

trans.tran_cn: 紫蓝色宝石，紫晶，紫水晶，紫色
trans.tran_en: a valuable purple stone used in jewellery
